amendment.description: An amendment numbered 14 printed in Part C of House Report 118-559 to cut the $600 million for the Border Wall and the $100 million plus-up for ICE transportation and reallocates this $700 million to FEMA for states, cities, and nonprofits to provide immigrant shelter and services.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garcia, Robert amendment (A008) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Garcia, Robert.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Garcia, Robert amendment (A008) Failed by voice vote.
